casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Quintin Sharod TAYLOR 32A19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 24, 2019 Kimberly P. Hoppin, Attorney at Law, for Taylor, Quintin Sharod. Kimberly N. Callahan, Assistant Attorney General, L. Johnson Britt, III, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 23rd of April 2019 by State of NC: "Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 24th of April 2019." State of NC shall have up to and including the 2nd day of May 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. Davis, J. recused
